whatIs.title: What is ChatBinder?
whatIs.content: ChatBinder is a local web application for viewing, organizing, and managing your LLM conversation history. It works entirely in your browser - no data leaves your device. Think of it as your personal chat archive manager.

quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.content:
1. Export your conversations from ChatGPT, Claude, or DeepSeek
2. Open ChatBinder in your browser
3. Click 'Import Chat History' and select your exported file
4. Your conversations will appear in the sidebar, ready to browse!

firstImport.title: Your First Import
firstImport.content: The first time you import, ChatBinder will parse all conversations and store them in your browser's IndexedDB. This may take a moment for large files. Once imported, you can search, sort, star, and organize your conversations.

chatgpt.name: ChatGPT
chatgpt.description: Import from ChatGPT using their data export feature. Supports both JSON and HTML formats.
chatgpt.step1: Go to chatgpt.com and click your profile (bottom-left)
chatgpt.step2: Go to Settings → Data Controls → Export data
chatgpt.step3: Request export and wait for the email
chatgpt.step4: Download the ZIP file and extract conversations.json or chat.html

claude.name: Claude
claude.description: Import from Claude using their data export feature. Supports JSON format.
claude.step1: Go to claude.com and click your profile (bottom-left)
claude.step2: Go to Settings → Privacy → Export data
claude.step3: Choose your time range and request export
claude.step4: Download the conversations.json file when you receive the email

deepseek.name: DeepSeek
deepseek.description: Import from DeepSeek Chat and DeepSeek Reasoner. Supports JSON format with collapsible thinking sections.
deepseek.step1: Go to chat.deepseek.com and click your profile (bottom-left)
deepseek.step2: Go to Settings → Data → Export Data
deepseek.step4: Extract and import conversations.json into ChatBinder

gemini.name: Gemini
gemini.description: Limited support through Google Takeout. Only supports activity JSON format, not Gemini Gem chats.

organizing.title: Organizing Conversations
organizing.folders: Use Custom Folders to group conversations by topic, project, or any way you like. Right-click any conversation to move it to a folder.
organizing.customFolders: Create new folders by clicking the folder icon in the sidebar header. Choose a name and color to organize your conversations visually.
organizing.moving: To move conversations: Right-click on a conversation → Select 'Move to...' → Choose destination folder. You can also drag conversations between folders.
organizing.starredThreads: Starred Threads are entire conversations you've marked as favorites. Click the star icon next to any conversation title to star it.
organizing.starredPairs: Starred Pairs are individual Q&A exchanges within conversations. Click the ☆ star button below any response to bookmark it. Perfect for saving specific answers.

searchFilter.title: Search & Filter
searchFilter.globalSearch: Use the Global Search bar in the sidebar to search across all conversations. Results show matching conversations with highlighted text.
searchFilter.conversationSearch: When viewing a conversation, use the in-conversation search to find specific messages. Navigate between matches using the arrow buttons.
searchFilter.sorting: Sort conversations by: Newest/Oldest Created, Recently Updated, or Alphabetical. Use the dropdown in the sidebar header.
searchFilter.dateFilter: Filter conversations by date using the calendar icon. Choose to filter by Created Date, Updated Date, or Contains Messages in Range.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.saving: Click Save Project to export all your conversations, folders, and starred items as a JSON file. Use this to backup your data or transfer to another device.
dataManagement.clearing: Clear Data removes all conversations from your browser's storage. This cannot be undone! Use this when you want to start fresh or before importing a new dataset.
dataManagement.privacy: ChatBinder is 100% local. All data is stored in your browser's IndexedDB. No servers, no data transmission, no tracking. Your conversations never leave your device.

offline.question: Does ChatBinder work offline?
offline.answer: Yes! Once loaded, ChatBinder works completely offline. Your data is stored locally in your browser, and no internet connection is required for any features.

storage.question: How much data can ChatBinder store?
storage.answer: ChatBinder uses IndexedDB, which can typically handle several hundred MB of data. This translates to thousands of conversations depending on their size.

privacy.question: Is my chat data private?
privacy.answer: Absolutely. ChatBinder is 100% local - no data leaves your browser. No accounts, no servers, no tracking, no analytics. Your conversations stay on your device.

duplicates.question: What happens if I import duplicate conversations?
duplicates.answer: ChatBinder detects duplicates and asks you to choose: Keep existing, Replace all, or Choose individually. You can import only new conversations while preserving your existing organization.

formats.question: What file formats are supported?
formats.answer: ChatBinder supports ChatGPT (JSON & HTML), Claude (JSON), DeepSeek (JSON), and Gemini activity JSON. The parser automatically detects the format type.
